text:
e="preserve">LaWanna "Lou" Shurtliff (June 13, 1935 – December 30, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Utah House of Representatives from 1999 through 2008 and from 2019 until her death. Shurtliff was born in Lincoln County, Wyoming.
Shurtliff died of pneumonia in Ogden, Utah on December 30, 2020 at the age of 85.
